typedef.name: error_t
typedef.brief: Enumerates all errors that may occur.
typedef.doc: Error also has the value `ERROR_NO_ERROR`, meaning no error occurred. This value will always be zero, so it's safe to check if an error occurred with `if (error) { ... }`.

function.name: error_string
function.brief: get a description of the error

return.doc: returns a static string describing the error
